title: Soojun Mens Elastic Waist Jeans Relaxed Fit with Zipper and Button
description: Men's jeans with elastic waistband ensures comfort all day long
These elastic waist jeans for men provides extra comfort without losing that dressy look
Men's expandable waist jeans features a full elastic expandable waistband with zipper, button and belt loops
Men's jeans with elastic waist have two front pockets and two back pockets and are very easy to pull up or down
Easy Care - Mens elastic waist denim jeans wash and dry inside out with like colors
